error.404: Oh no ! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or moved elsewhere...

presentation.question: What's the concept here ? Well ... plants, tons of plants, from small cuttings to adults, all for adoption! And they're only one swap away.
presentation.point1: Check for care advice for your plants and identify them.
presentation.point2: Keep an inventory of all your owned babies.
presentation.point3: Build your personal wishlist with rare gems you're looking for.
presentation.point4: Exchange fussy plants that just can't seem to thrive no matter what you do.
presentation.point5: Swap smartly ! Indicate which plants you wish to acquire for each swap that you propose.
